item.title: Bessent to American businesses: 'Not the end of the world' if April 2 tariffs kick in
item.description: Top Trump administration officials insist that the Aug. 1 deadline is not changing, even as dozens of countries' trade negotiations are unresolved.

item.title: Trump says Jeffrey Epstein 'stole' Virginia Giuffre from Mar-a-Lago spa
item.description: Virginia Giuffre had said she was sexually abused by Jeffrey Epstein after Ghislaine Maxwell spotted her working at Trump's club in Florida.

item.title: U.S.-China trade talks end without extension of tariff truce, as Trump weighs options
item.description: The U.S. and China had agreed to pause most of the sky-high tariffs on each others' goods amid trade negotiations â€“ but that pause is set to expire in...

item.title: Trump EPA seeks to repeal finding that carbon dioxide emissions threaten public health
item.description: The EPA action is part of President Donald Trump's broader effort to expand fossil fuel production while limiting the expansion of renewable energy.

item.title: With Trump pressure and a 'new Lebanon,' can Hezbollah's shadow economy be dismantled?
item.description: "Hezbollah finds itself in its greatest predicament since its foundation," one regional expert told CNBC.
